name: The Gift of Sentience
description:
Use  WASD or Arrow keys to traverse the environment, and Space to climb and cross gaps.

Get stuck? Press ESC key to pull up the menu or R to reset.

Explore the calming 3D space of The Gift of Sentience. The more slimes you gather, the further you can go!

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam #10. 

Most assets were made by us, although we use a few 3D asset packs which include:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/polygon-knights-pa...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cl...

Everything else, including 3D models, illustrations and all sound effects were made by our team.

Walter Keiler: Programing and UI

Douglas Ngo: Programing and Systems Building

Michael Anderson: Programing and Level Design/Environments 

Ginger Mellot: Illustration and 3D asset creation

Alex Weber: Sound Design

We hope you enjoy!
